place.name: BROTHERTOFT
place.gazetteerText: BROTHERTOFT, a chapelry in Kirton parish, Lincoln; 2 miles SSW of Langrick r. station, and 4½ WNW of Boston. Post Town, Boston. Acres, 900. Real property, £1,867. Pop., 124. Houses, 23. The living is a donative in the diocese of Lincoln. Value, £150. Patron, T. Gee, Esq. Charities, £43. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
